Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits price gouging on certain consumer goods sold at thruway gas stations, restaurants, and other facilities
Summary: Prohibits price gouging on certain consumer goods sold at thruway gas stations, restaurants, and other facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-r, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting price gouging on certain consumer goods sold at thruway gas stations, restaurants, and other facilities
